reviews.review_msg: Great Prof, i wish more teachers would embrace a more hands on teaching style like this; with talking circles, guest speakers, open-topic papers, negotiable terms and field trips!! definitely recommend 315, 442 or any special topics courses with her for sure!
Brenda cares about her students and is passionate about what she teaches. I would recommend.

Very disorganized class and her expectations of assignments are not very clear. Criteria tend to be given within a short notice, which puts everyone unsettled. Even the way of handing in the assignments too.
